name: Exploration (itch) (Geek_Joystick)
description: This is a small demo of my first NES game (I haven't actually tried it on hardware, but it does work on emulator). I made that in about a week and I count on adding more levels and uploading a full version. This demo only comports one level, but keep in mind that this was done from scratch, in one week, by a guy that started the same week to learn programmation on the NES. That doesn't mean you can take my work, ask me beforehand.
